docs.snippet: WEITZNER--Charles M., D.D.S. "Chuck", 73, of Charlestown, RI, formerly of Manhattan, NY, passed away on Tuesday, May 6, 2014. He was the husband of Susan Ford McKenna Weitzner for 18 years. Born in Manhattan, NY, the son of the late Joseph and Fri...
docs.lead_paragraph: WEITZNER--Charles M., D.D.S. "Chuck", 73, of Charlestown, RI, formerly of Manhattan, NY, passed away on Tuesday, May 6, 2014. He was the husband of Susan Ford McKenna Weitzner for 18 years. Born in Manhattan, NY, the son of the late Joseph and Frieda (Spindel) Weitzner. Charles was a prosthodontist with practices in both Manhattan and the East Side of Providence for many years. He enjoyed wood working and metal working; was an avid Duke Basketball fan and a proud alumnus. Besides his wife he is survived by three step-daughters, Lauren McKenna of Westerly, Katie Holland and Moira Young both of South Kingstown; eleven grandchildren and three great-grandchildren. He was the brother of the late Jay Weitzner. His funeral and burial will be private. In lieu of flowers contributions in his memory may be made to the Wounded Warriors Project, P.O. Box 758517, Topeka, KS 66675. For guestbook and condolences, please visit: averystortifuneralhome.com.

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEITZNER, CHARLES M.

docs.snippet: The National Basketball Association on Friday installed former Time Warner CEO and chairman Richard Parsons as interim chief executive of the Los Angeles Clippers while preparing for an unprecedented bid to force out the team's owner, Donald Sterl...
docs.lead_paragraph: The National Basketball Association on Friday installed former Time Warner CEO and chairman Richard Parsons as interim chief executive of the Los Angeles Clippers while preparing for an unprecedented bid to force out the team's owner, Donald Sterling.

headline.main: Former Time Warner Chief Named Interim CEO of Los Angeles Clippers
headline.print_headline: Former Time Warner Chief Named Interim CEO of Los Angeles Clippers
